document_data.name: Isbeth
document_data.mainbody:
'''Isbeth''' was a giant black [[wolf]] kept by the [[Zhentarim]] that operated within an [[Zhentarim hideout (Risen Road)|underground trading post]] hidden deep within the caverns underneath [[Waukeen's Rest]], during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Around and around again. Master gets confused, I think.''|Isbeth}}
document_data.Relationships: Isbeth spent much of her time protecting his human [[Jarg]]. He often expressed frustration at Jarg's regular pacing and retracing of his steps.
document_data.History: Isbeth reluctantly followed Jarg around as he helped clear out the Zhentarim hideout in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, for risk of having their operation upended by the [[Flaming Fist]] of [[Baldur's Gate]].
